_meta.description: Skills du Mage. DOUBLE scaling: base_power (flat) + scaling_percent (% de scaling_stat).
_meta.scaling_note: Scaling sur MAG. Mage = glass cannon, dégâts > survie. Système de charges arcaniques (voir passives.json).

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 18 (+45% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Génère 1 Charge Arcanique.
base_skills.description_en:
Arcane energy takes shape between your fingers.
Deals 18 (+45% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Generates 1 Arcane Charge.

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 15 (+35% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Génère 1 Charge Arcanique.
base_skills.description_en:
A pulse of pure energy radiates from the mage.
Deals 15 (+35% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Generates 1 Arcane Charge.

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 40 (+70% MAG) dégâts magiques en croix.
Temps d'incantation : 3s.
Consomme jusqu'à 3 Charges Arcaniques : +25% dégâts par charge consommée.
base_skills.description_en:
The Rifts tear open and arcane power is unleashed.
Deals 40 (+70% MAG) magic damage in a cross pattern. Cast time: 3s.
Consumes up to 3 Arcane Charges: +25% damage per charge consumed.

base_skills.description_fr: Génère un bouclier absorbant 20% du souffle maximum pendant 6s.
base_skills.description_en:
Breath crystallizes into a protective barrier.
Creates a shield absorbing 20% of max breath for 6s.

base_skills.description_fr:
Canalise pendant 3s, régénérant 8% du souffle maximum par seconde (24% total).
Interruptible.
base_skills.description_en:
The mage draws upon the Rifts to restore their energy.
Channels for 3s, regenerating 8% of max MP per second (24% total).
Interruptible.

elementalist.identity: Elemental damage + Burn/Chill stacking + AOE coverage

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 20 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Applique 1 charge de Brûlure et 1 charge de Givre.
skills.description_en:
Fire and ice merge into a single projectile.
Deals 20 (+50% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Applies 1 Burn and 1 Chill stack.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 25 (+45% MAG) dégâts magiques à 3 ennemis en ligne.
Applique 2 charges de Brûlure à chaque ennemi.
skills.description_en:
Primordial flames surge forth in a blazing wave.
Deals 25 (+45% MAG) magic damage to 3 targets in a row.
Applies 2 Burn stacks to each target.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 30 (+55% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Gèle l'ennemi pendant 4s.
skills.description_en:
A pillar of ice pierces the target through.
Deals 30 (+55% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Freezes the target for 4s.

skills.description_fr: Augmente les dégâts magiques de 25% pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
The mage channels the raw power of the elements.
Increases magic damage by 25% for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 30 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques à TOUS les ennemis.
Applique 1 charge de Brûlure et 1 charge de Givre à chaque ennemi.
skills.description_en:
The elements rage across the battlefield.
Deals 30 (+50% MAG) magic damage to ALL enemies.
Applies 1 Burn and 1 Chill stack to each target.
Signature skill.

occultist.identity: Dark magic + debuffs + drains + Corruption DoT

corruption.description: DoT d'ombre. Se refresh à chaque application.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 18 (+45% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Applique 1 charge de Corruption.
skills.description_en:
A venomous shadow lashes out at the target.
Deals 18 (+45% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Applies 1 Corruption stack.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+25% MAG) dégâts magiques.
Réduit l'ATK et la DEF de l'ennemi de 20% pendant 8s.
30% de chance d'infliger la Peur pendant 2s.
skills.description_en:
An ancient curse gnaws at the target's body and spirit.
Deals 10 (+25% MAG) magic damage.
Reduces the target's ATK and DEF by 20% for 8s.
30% chance to inflict Fear for 2s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 25 (+55% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Vol de vie : récupère 30% des dégâts infligés en HP (+2% par niveau).
Réduit les soins reçus par la cible de 50% pendant 4s.
skills.description_en:
Darkness siphons the life force from the enemy.
Deals 25 (+55% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Lifesteal: recovers 30% of damage dealt as HP (+2% per level).
Reduces healing received by the target by 50% for 4s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 22 (+40% MAG) dégâts magiques à 3 ennemis en ligne.
Impose le Silence pendant 2s.
skills.description_en:
The veil between worlds tears apart, shattering all focus.
Deals 22 (+40% MAG) magic damage to 3 targets in a row.
Inflicts Silence for 2s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 35 (+60% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Vol de vie : récupère 25% des dégâts en HP (+1.5% par niveau).
+10% de dégâts par débuff actif sur les ennemis (max +30%).
skills.description_en:
A pact sealed in darkness devours those already weakened.
Deals 35 (+60% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Lifesteal: recovers 25% of damage as HP (+1.5% per level).
+10% damage per active debuff on targets (max +30%).
Signature skill.

cardmaster.identity: High variance gambler - huge wins or painful losses

gambling.description: All skills have success/failure chances. Higher levels improve odds but never guarantee success.
gambling.design_note: Average damage slightly above normal to reward risk-taking, but VERY high variance.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 20 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
50% de chance de double incantation (x2), 50% de chance d'échec (x0.5).
+1.1% de chance de succès par niveau.
skills.description_en:
Fate rests in the hands of chance.
Deals 20 (+50% MAG) magic damage to one target.
50% chance to double cast (x2), 50% chance to fail (x0.5).
+1.1% success chance per level.

skills.description_fr:
Pioche 1 à 4 améliorations aléatoires (minimum 2 au niveau 5).
Durée : 6s (+0.4s par niveau).
skills.description_en:
Fortune favors the bold... sometimes.
Draws 1 to 4 random buffs (minimum 2 at level 5).
Duration: 6s (+0.4s per level).
The result can be brilliant or disappointing.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 40 (+80% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
70% de chance de succès (+1.3% par niveau).
Échec : 0 dégâts et s'inflige 10% de ses HP en dégâts (-0.5% par niveau).
skills.description_en:
All or nothing. The stakes have never been higher.
Deals 40 (+80% MAG) magic damage to one target.
70% success chance (+1.3% per level).
Failure: 0 damage and takes 10% of own HP as damage (-0.5% per level).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 15 (+35% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Applique 1 à 3 débuffs aléatoires (minimum 2 au niveau 5).
Durée : 5s (+0.3s par niveau).
skills.description_en:
The spell turns luck against your enemies.
Deals 15 (+35% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Applies 1 to 3 random debuffs (minimum 2 at level 5).
Duration: 5s (+0.3s per level).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 35 (+60% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x3.
50% Jackpot (x3 dégâts), 30% Normal, 20% Fiasco (soigne les ennemis de 5%).
Les probabilités s'améliorent avec le niveau.
skills.description_en:
The ultimate gamble. Let luck decide everything.
Deals 35 (+60% MAG) magic damage in a 2x3 area.
50% Jackpot (x3 damage), 30% Normal, 20% Bust (heals enemies for 5%).
Odds improve with level.
Signature skill.

spellblade.identity: AP Bruiser melee + Arcane Momentum stacking + MR shred

arcane_momentum.description: Stacks de combat. +3% dégâts par stack. Refresh à chaque gain.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 15 (+50% MAG) dégâts magiques à un ennemi.
Génère 1 charge d'Élan Arcanique.
skills.description_en:
The blade traces an arc imbued with arcane energy.
Deals 15 (+50% MAG) magic damage to one target.
Generates 1 Arcane Momentum stack.

skills.description_fr:
Enchante votre arme pendant 10s : +20% vitesse d'attaque, attaques automatiques +25% MAG en dégâts bonus, +15% pénétration magique.
Les attaques automatiques génèrent 1 charge d'Élan Arcanique.
skills.description_en:
Arcane runes etch themselves along the blade.
Enchants your weapon for 10s: +20% attack speed, auto-attacks +25% MAG as bonus damage, +15% magic penetration.
Auto-attacks generate 1 Arcane Momentum stack.

skills.description_fr: Génère un bouclier absorbant 25% de la MAG en dégâts pendant 8s.
skills.description_en:
A magical ward envelops the mage in close combat.
Creates a shield absorbing 25% of MAG as damage for 8s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 18 (+40% MAG) dégâts magiques en zone 2x2.
Réduit la résistance magique des ennemis de 25% pendant 6s.
skills.description_en:
Arcane energy focuses and shatters enemy defenses.
Deals 18 (+40% MAG) magic damage in a 2x2 area.
Reduces targets' magic resistance by 25% for 6s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 35 (+60% MAG) dégâts magiques à 3 ennemis en ligne.
+5% de dégâts par charge d'Élan Arcanique.
skills.description_en:
The blade carves a devastating arc, releasing all accumulated energy.
Deals 35 (+60% MAG) magic damage to 3 targets in a row.
+5% damage per Arcane Momentum stack.
Signature skill.
